ROOT.QUERY: SELECT ecdsite "Location", ecdcexcde "PO #", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc.", to_char(ecddcom,''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Order on", ecdetat || '' | '' || pkparpostes.get_postlibl@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,502, ecdetat, ''HN'') "Status", to_char(ecddenvoi,''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Sending date", (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod WHERE ecdcincde=dcdcincde AND ecdcfin=dcdcfin AND ecdsite=dcdsite) "Nb. items", ''The automatic validation process ran and this PO has not been automatically validated.'' "Comment" FROM cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE ecdetat=3 AND ecdurg=0 AND SYSDATE > ecddenvoi AND ecdcfin=foucfin AND ecddenvoi > ecddcom AND TRUNC(ecddcom)=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM erreurprg@heinens_custom_prod WHERE errprog=''pscde45p'' AND TRUNC(errdcre)=TRUNC(ecddenvoi) AND errstat=2 AND sysdate > errdcre and errdcre > ecddenvoi AND (sysdate-errdcre)* 24 * 60 > 5 /* ran at least 5 minutes ago */) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM erreurprg@heinens_custom_prod WHERE errprog=''pscde45p'' AND TRUNC(errdcre)=TRUNC(ecddenvoi) AND errstat=8 AND errdcre > ecddenvoi ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM alertlog, alerts where LALTID=ALTID AND ALTREALTIME=1 AND ALTID=''COL0000000002'' AND LALTMESS LIKE ''%'' || ecdcexcde || ''%'') /* No reported yet */ UNION SELECT ecdsite "Location", ecdcexcde "PO #", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc.", to_char(ecddcom,''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Order on", ecdetat || '' | '' || pkparpostes.get_postlibl@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,502, ecdetat, ''HN'') "Status", to_char(ecddenvoi,''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Sending date", (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod WHERE ecdcincde=dcdcincde AND ecdcfin=dcdcfin AND ecdsite=dcdsite) "Nb. items", ''The store PO is in awaiting delivery but has not been collected. Main reason is user was on it.'' "Comment" FROM cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE ecdetat=5 AND ecdurg=0 AND foutype=3 AND SYSDATE > ecddenvoi AND ecdcfin=foucfin AND ecddenvoi > ecddcom AND TRUNC(ecddcom)=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ccldetccl@heinens_custom_prod WHERE cclcexcde=ecdcexcde) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM erreurprg@heinens_custom_prod st, erreurprg@heinens_custom_prod ed WHERE st.errprog=''psccl30p'' AND st.errmess LIKE ''%'' || ecdsitli || ''%'' || to_char(trunc(SYSDATE,''DD/MM/RR'')) || ''%'' AND TRUNC(st.errdcre)=TRUNC(ecddenvoi) AND st.errstat=2 AND sysdate > st.errdcre and st.errdcre > ecddenvoi AND (sysdate-st.errdcre)* 24 * 60 > 5 /* ran at least 5 minutes ago */ AND ed.errprog=st.errprog AND st.errtrid=ed.errtrid AND ed.errstat=8) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM alertlog, alerts where LALTID=ALTID AND ALTREALTIME=1 AND ALTID=''COL0000000002'' AND LALTMESS LIKE ''%'' || ecdcexcde || ''%'') /* No reported yet */
